item.title: Nhân sinh vô thường, hãy tỉnh giấc Sức khỏe
item.author: BTV Epoch Times Tiếng Việt
item.description: <table> <tbody> <tr> <td class="" style=" padding: 24px 0px 0px 0px; display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 12px; border-bottom: 1px solid #cccccc; " > <span class="sectionTitleText" style=" font-size: 22px; line-height: 31px; font-weight: 700; font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif; text-decoration: none; color: #0b0b0b; text-transform: uppercase; " > Video </span> </td> </tr> <tr> <td> <div class="u-row-container v-row-padding--vertical v-row-background-color" style="padding: 0px;background-color: #ebebeb"> <div class="u-row
